title: Rihanna reveals new album cover, title
text:
Rihanna at MAMA Gallery on October 7, 2015 in Los Angeles, California. (Photo: Christopher Polk, Getty)
7 CONNECT 28 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE We still don't have a release date for Rihanna's forthcoming eighth record, but on Thursday night, the singer revealed her album title and art in style.
At an event at Los Angeles' MAMA Gallery, Rihanna revealed the front and back artwork for her new album, as well as its nameâ€” ANTI .
Contemporary artist Roy Nachum, who also had a hand in the art for Kanye West's 2010 album My Beautiful Dark Twisted Fantasy , is behind the ANTI covers. According to a release, the album cover depicts "a young girl with a gold crown covering her eyes, and a black balloon strung tightly to her wrist."

ANTI will also have a Braille component, described in the release as "the first time an album has ever incorporated physical Braille." The seven oil paintings revealed at the event were inscribed with Braille poetry, and the album's inside artwork will also include Braille, "[allowing] people who are blind to experience an entire album by touch."
